# Anna Designer - Personal Portfolio Website

> A modern, responsive Jekyll portfolio website template for freelance designers and developers. Features multi-language support (English/Russian), SEO optimization, blog functionality, project showcases, and a clean, professional design.

This repository contains a complete Jekyll-based personal portfolio website with the following key features:
- Multi-language support (English and Russian)
- Responsive design optimized for all devices
- SEO optimization with meta tags and structured data
- Portfolio showcase with modal galleries
- Blog functionality with categorized posts
- Project case studies and work examples
- Contact forms with validation
- Modern UI with smooth animations
- Fast loading with optimized assets

## Documentation

- [README](README.md): Complete project documentation, installation guide, and usage instructions
- [Project Structure](README.md): Detailed explanation of all directories and files

## Configuration

- [Main Configuration](_config.yml): Primary Jekyll configuration file
- [Netlify Configuration](netlify.toml): Deployment configuration for Netlify
- [Redirects](_redirects): URL redirection rules
- [Gemfile](Gemfile): Ruby dependencies and gems used in the project
- [Gemfile.lock](Gemfile.lock): Locked dependency versions

## Content Pages

- [Homepage](index.md): Main landing page content
- [About Page](about.md): Personal introduction and background
- [Work Page](work.md): Portfolio and services overview
- [Contacts Page](contacts.md): Contact information and form details
- [FAQ Page](faq.md): Frequently asked questions
- [Success Page](success.md): Success stories and testimonials
- [Example Reels](example-reels.html): Showcase of design examples and reels
- [Blog Page](blog.html): Blog posts listing and navigation

## Russian Content

- [Russian Homepage](ru/index.md): Russian version of the homepage
- [Russian About](ru/about.md): Russian about page
- [Russian Work](ru/work.md): Russian work and portfolio page
- [Russian Contacts](ru/contacts.md): Russian contact page
- [Russian FAQ](ru/faq.md): Russian FAQ page
- [Russian Blog](ru/blog.html): Russian blog page

## Blog Posts

- [Blog Posts Directory](_posts/): Collection of English blog articles
- [Russian Blog Posts](_posts_ru/): Russian translations of blog articles
- [Design Systems Post](_posts/2024-12-15-design-systems-that-people-actually-use.md): Guide to effective design systems
- [AI Designer Post](_posts/2024-12-20-ai-as-your-junior-designer.md): Using AI tools in design workflow
- [Case Studies Post](_posts/2024-12-25-case-studies-that-convert.md): Creating compelling case studies
- [Senior Developer Guide](_posts/2025-01-05-the-80-20-guide-to-becoming-a-senior-developer.md): Career development guide
- [Code Reviews Post](_posts/2025-01-10-fast-kind-useful-code-reviews.md): Best practices for code reviews
- [Service Design Post](_posts/2025-01-15-designing-reliable-services.md): Designing reliable digital services
- [Freelance Pricing](_posts/2025-01-20-freelance-pricing-that-survives-scope-creep.md): Pricing strategies for freelancers
- [Lead Generation](_posts/2025-01-25-90-day-plan-to-build-freelance-lead-machine.md): Building a freelance lead generation system
- [Business Operations](_posts/2025-01-30-run-your-one-person-business-like-a-firm.md): Managing a solo business operation

## Data Files

- [Translations](_data/translations.yml): Multi-language text strings and labels
- [Navigation](_data/navigation.yml): Site navigation structure
- [FAQ Data](_data/faq.yml): FAQ content and structure
- [Pinned Projects](_data/pinned-projects.yml): Featured project configuration

## Templates and Layouts

- [Default Layout](_layouts/default.html): Base HTML template for all pages
- [Home Layout](_layouts/home.html): Homepage-specific layout
- [Page Layout](_layouts/page.html): Standard page layout template
- [About Layout](_layouts/about.html): About page layout
- [Post Layout](_layouts/post.html): Blog post layout template
- [Project Layout](_layouts/project.html): Project case study layout

## Components

- [Head Component](_includes/head.html): HTML head with meta tags and SEO
- [Header Component](_includes/header.html): Site navigation header
- [Hero Component](_includes/hero.html): Homepage hero section
- [Services Component](_includes/services.html): Services offered section
- [Process Component](_includes/process.html): Work process explanation
- [Resources Component](_includes/resources.html): Resources and tools section
- [Work Showcase](_includes/work-showcase.html): Portfolio work display component
- [Language Switcher](_includes/language-switcher.html): Language switching component
- [Contact Form](_includes/contact-form.html): Main contact form component
- [Simple Contact Form](_includes/contact-form-simple.html): Simplified contact form
- [Reading Time](_includes/reading-time.html): Blog post reading time calculator
- [Thanks Bottom](_includes/thanks-bottom.html): Thank you section component
- [Final CTA](_includes/final-cta.html): Final call-to-action section
- [Footer Component](_includes/footer.html): Site footer
- [SEO Component](_includes/seo.html): SEO optimization includes

## Styles

- [Main Stylesheet](assets/css/main.scss): Primary SCSS file that imports all styles
- [Variables](_sass/_variables.scss): Design system variables and colors
- [Base Styles](_sass/_base.scss): Base HTML element styles
- [Layout Styles](_sass/_layout.scss): Page layout and structure styles
- [Component Styles](_sass/_components.scss): Individual component styles
- [Critical Styles](_sass/_critical.scss): Above-the-fold critical CSS
- [Header Styles](_sass/_header-modern.scss): Modern header component styles
- [Hero Styles](_sass/_hero-modern.scss): Modern hero section styles
- [Services Styles](_sass/_services-modern.scss): Services section styles
- [Resources Styles](_sass/_resources-modern.scss): Resources section styles
- [Work Styles](_sass/_work-modern.scss): Work/portfolio section styles
- [Posts Styles](_sass/_posts-modern.scss): Blog posts styling
- [Thanks Bottom Styles](_sass/_thanks-bottom.scss): Thanks section styling
- [Performance Styles](_sass/_performance.scss): Performance optimization styles
- [Responsive Styles](_sass/_responsive.scss): Mobile and responsive design styles

## Assets

- [Main JavaScript](assets/js/main.js): Primary JavaScript functionality
- [Project JavaScript](assets/js/projects.js): Project showcase functionality
- [JavaScript Components](assets/js/components/): Reusable JavaScript components
- [JavaScript Core](assets/js/core/): Core JavaScript utilities
- [JavaScript Modules](assets/js/modules/): Modular JavaScript functionality
- [JavaScript Pages](assets/js/pages/): Page-specific JavaScript
- [Images Directory](assets/images/): Logo, portfolio images, testimonials, and other visual assets
- [Avatar Image](assets/images/avatar.png): Profile avatar image
- [Logo Files](assets/images/logo.svg): Main logo in SVG format
- [White Logo](assets/images/logo-white.svg): White version of logo
- [Background Images](assets/images/bgs/): Background image assets
- [Icons Directory](assets/icons/): Icon assets and favicons

## Optional

- [Sitemap](sitemap.xml): XML sitemap for search engines
- [Robots.txt](robots.txt): Instructions for web crawlers
- [Site Directory](_site/): Generated static site files (build output)</content>
